Review_Text: SpoilerThis is yet another highlight of the Tempo documentary festival, by a great director, and conveying an interesting and dramatic outlook at life indeed.It is a very well written documentary, conveying all of these people's stories splendidly, very poignant and highly emotional indeed. Very well writing and pacing, and an unique and very true outlook.The cinematography, cutting and editing is incredible, very beautifully put together indeed, and very feature worthy and unique.Definitely a recommended and important film, that everyone should see! Give this stellar documentary a watch for sure.
